feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
